titleStmt.title: A booke of soueraigne approued medicines and remedies as well for sundry diseases within the body as also for all sores, woundes, ... Not onely very necessary and profitable, but also commodious for all suche as shall vouchsafe to practise and vse the same.

publicationStmt.publisher: Nigh vnto the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dauson, and Thomas Gardyner,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect as filmed; title page too light, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Cranes in the Vintree
